texmaker.desktop CC0-1.0 GPL-2.0 Texmaker ​ Latex editor
Texmaker is a clean, powerful and highly configurable LaTeX editor.
Texmaker integrates many tools needed to develop documents with LaTeX, in just one application.
It has some nice features such as syntax highlighting, insertion of 370 mathematical symbols with only one click, a structure view of the document for easier navigation.
